info.name: Userstyles "Hitchhiker" DARK+CENTERED
info.description: A dark and centered version of our beloved userstyles.org! :) features: -dark interface -centered -userstyles Logo instead of plain text -optimized icons -hovering menu on style pages Also check out these dark themes :) Facebook "HitchHiker" Userstyles "HitchHiker" Youtube "HitchHiker" ZippyShare "HitchHiker" Greasy Fork "HitchHiker" Wikipedia Fork "HitchHiker" FEEL FREE TO SEND IDEAS, SUGGESTIONS AND QUESTIONS TO -> hitchhikerstyle@gmail.com Please comment and give feedback if you like this Style :) it would help me a lot in terms of motivation. Thanks!
info.additionalInfo:
17.06.2013 - fixed it up after the userstyles maxwidth-update
20.03.2014 - was about time for an update :) fixed most flaws
24.04.2014 - Big props to Hyokkuda Ryosan for kicking some ugly stuff out of the style! :)
26.04.2014 - Restyled it :) didn't like the old look
